flawed_nl_solution:
The third chapter has P + 3 + 3 = P + <<+3+3=6>>6 pages.
The fourth chapter has P + 6 + 3 = P + <<+6+3=9>>9 pages.
The fifth chapter has P + 9 + 3 = P + <<+9+3=17>>17 pages.
The whole book has P + 3 + P + 6 + P + 9 + P + 17 = 5P + 35 = 95 pages.
Thus, without the 35 extra pages from additional chapters, 5P = 95 - 35 = 60 pages.
Therefore, the first chapter had P = 60 / 5 = <<60/5=12>>12 pages.
#### 12

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 12, not 17. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
